mapper.insert: insert into t_paper (id, name, mark, number, time, teacher_id, teacher, ext ) values (null , #{name}, null, null, #{time}, #{teacher_id}, #{teacher}, null );
mapper.update: update t_paper set mark =(select sum(mark) from t_question where paper_id=#{paper_id}), number = (select count(0) from t_question where paper_id=#{paper_id}) where id = #{paper_id}
mapper.select: select id, paper_id, number, name, flag, mark, q_A, q_B, q_C, q_D from t_question where paper_id=#{paper_id} order by flag,number
select name,time from t_paper where id=#{paper_id}
select id, name, mark, number, time, teacher_id, teacher from t_paper where id not in(select paper_id from t_grade where school_id=#{school_id}) LIMIT #{start},#{end};
select count(0) from t_paper where id not in(select paper_id from t_grade where school_id=#{school_id});

select id, name, mark, number, time, teacher_id, teacher from t_paper where 1=1
and name like concat('%', #{name},'%')
and teacher like concat('%', #{teacher},'%')
LIMIT #{start},#{end};

select count(0) from t_paper where 1=1
and name like concat('%', #{name},'%')
and teacher like concat('%', #{teacher},'%')
